name: Okaaay Mom!
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021 - TBA Games

-About Game

As the time progresses, try to find the items you need, if you find it, your credit increases, and get the next day,  credit parameter  decreases unless you can find items that you ordered. Don't forget! If your mom gets very angry she'll dive into your room.

-Game Play
You have to go outside and got very little time. Take what needs to be taken with you and make sure to be tidy. If you don't pay attention, your mom might get a little angry. Move with LRB, Grab with RMB.

-Mechanics

  1. Picking & Dropping
  2. Item management
  3. Super hero landing
  4. Walking around

All assets, scripts and UI objects created by TBA Games.
